title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: October 09, 2022, 12:40:51 PMLast edit: July 03, 2024, 11:32:19 AM by cygan
content: today the qualifying groups for the uefa euro 2024 tournament in germany were drawn and there are some interesting duels.the qualifiers (group c) will see a rematch of the 2021 final between italy and england. group b also features a top duel between the netherlands and world champions france.after the remaining 3 countries qualified for the tournament yesterday, the group stage looks like this:as hosts, germany automatically qualifies, so 23 places are up for grabs. the first two teams in each of the ten qualifying groups will earn a ticket to the european championship. the remaining three participants will be determined in the play-offs.the host cities will then be the stadiums in berlin, cologne, munich, frankfurt, hamburg, dortmund, leipzig, gelsenkirchen, stuttgart and düsseldorf.

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: I was looking for this topic too, I was going to open it because no one opened it.Türkiye's group has been very difficult. Croatia and Wales are tough rivals, and next to them, there is Latvia, which is always on the opposite side. Armenia, where we have problems politically is another opponent. In this group, Türkiye can be 1st or 3rd. Only two teams from the group will participate in the tournament. My guess is that Croatia and Türkiye will come out, but Wales has a good chance too. Wales will go into restructuring, after the World Cup Bale no longer plays. That might be a problem for them.It should be an embarrassment for Türkiye to even draw from Pot 4, but the arrival of Armenia, the weakest team from Pot 3, made us ignore it. We are not in the World Cup. It's a must to advance from this group and participate in Euro 2024.

Poland and Czech Republic are almost certain to qualify, as the other three teams are not very strong contenders (Moldova, Faroe Islands and Albania). I am not forgetting the victory by Faroe Islands against Turkey. But we can't expect such a small nation to perform consistently against top UEFA teams (Faroe Islands is a country with total population of less than 50,000). And finally for Group I,  the battle for second position is going to be triangular, between Romania, Israel and Kosovo.
